title: Top U.S. states by number of hogs and pigs 2019
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number in thousands for 10 number of States.
The Number in thousands is highest at State Iowa and lowest at State Kansas.
There is a difference of 21460.0 between the maximum State Iowa and minimum State Kansas.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number in thousands for 10 number of States.
The Number in thousands is highest at State Iowa and lowest at State Kansas.
State North Carolina has the second highest value for Number in thousands.
